sentences.en: In recording, an arrangement that will synchronize separate sound and picture tracks.
sentences.cn: 在录象技术中, 使声音和图象同步的一种安排.

sentences.en: It was virtually impossible to synchronize our lives so as to take vacations and weekends together.
sentences.cn: 为了一起度假和过周末而要让我们的生活同步几乎是不可能的。

sentences.en: Let's synchronize our watches, ie set them to show the same time.
Or, select the directory for downloading when you synchronize for working offline.
sentences.cn: 否则, 请选择在同步脱机工作时要下载的目录.

sentences.en: Synchronize and combine ICQ databases with this unique tool.
sentences.cn: 同步并且把ICQ数据库与这个唯一的工具相结合.

sentences.en: Synchronize the score with the film action.
sentences.cn: 让配乐和电影动作同步。

sentences.en: The film does not synchronize with sound.
sentences.cn: 该影片画面与声音不同步.

sentences.en: The sound on a film must synchronize with the action.
sentences.cn: 影片中的声音必须与动作配合一致.

sentences.en: The sound track did not synchronize with the action.
The Synchronizer allows you to synchronize folders, disks or computers.
sentences.cn: 同步器可让您同步文件夹, 磁盘或计算机上.

sentences.en: The title in a move should synchronize with the action.
sentences.cn: 电影中的标题应该与剧情同步.

sentences.en: To synchronize a particular type of information, select its checkbox.
sentences.cn: 若要同步特定类型的信息, 请选中其复选框.

sentences.en: Unable to synchronize the row because due to an unspecified error.
sentences.cn: 由于发生未指定的错误,无法同步该行.

sentences.en: We need to synchronize our technological progress with ourprinciples.
sentences.cn: 我们需要确保科学技术的进步与我们的原则同步.

sentences.en: We tell it to synchronize and are promptly stopped in our tracks by this important message.
sentences.cn: 我们告诉它做同步,它却突然弹出这条消息来打扰我们的正常工作.

sentences.en: Yon have to synchronize the soundtrack with the film.
sentences.cn: 你必须使电影画面与声道同步.

sentences.en: You must synchronize your Inbox before selecting additional folders.
sentences.cn: 在选择其他文件夹前,您必须同步您的收件箱.

words.tran_cn: 不考虑历史上变化的；限于一时的；完全同步的
同时性；对照性历史年谱（等于synchronism）
同步；同一时刻；同时发生
同时发生，同步性；对照性历史年谱
[电] 同步装置；同步闪光装置
同步指示器；同步示波器；同期表；同步表
同步检定器；[电子] 同步示波器
[核] 同步加速器；同步回旋加速器
使同时（synchronise的过去式和过去分词）
使协调（synchronize的过去分词）；同时发生；校准
使同步；使同时发生（等于synchronize）

trans.tran_en: If you synchronize two activities, processes, or movements, or if you synchronize one activity, process, or movement with another, you cause them to happen at the same time and speed as each other
